thread.title: Associa Arizona Promotes New Community Directors

author: cnbc.com
title: Associa Arizona Promotes New Community Directors
text:
Tucson, AZ, May 21, 2018 (GLOBE NEWSWIRE) -- Associa Arizona announces the recent promotion to the role of community director for Kim Harrison, Mandi Bates and Linda Parker.
Ms. Harrison has more than 17 years of industry experience as well as a vast career in customer service. In 2002, she founded the Harrison Group, a community management company in California. At Associa Arizona, she focuses on delivering unsurpassed management and customer service to her communities and clients.
Ms. Bates is a community manager with more than 23 years of customer service experience including 15 years specializing in multi-housing and Homeowners Association (HOA) management. Ms. Bates holds a Liberal Arts degree with a Certificate of Humanities Studies as well as an Arizona Real Estate License since 2010.
Ms. Parker has more than 14 years of association property management experience in southern Arizona. She has managed different property types including single-family homes, condominiums, townhomes, and business plazas. As an Associa Arizona team member, Ms. Parker has held several positions including administrative assistant and community manager, where she focuses on transitioning new and developing communities to homeowner-controlled associations. She is a member of the Community Associations Institute (CAI) and is actively pursuing her Professional Community Association Manager (PCAM) designation.
“Associa Arizona is proud to announce the promotions of these very deserving and dedicated employees,” stated Kirk Bliss, Associa Arizona president. “As community directors, these experienced managers will be a valuable resource to our communities, residents and team members. They will help maintain our excellent customer service and continue to improve our day-to-day operations.”
With more than 180 branch offices across North America, Associa delivers unsurpassed management and lifestyle services to nearly five million residents worldwide. Our 10,000+ team members lead the industry with unrivaled education, expertise and trailblazing innovation. For more than 40 years, Associa has provided solutions designed to help communities achieve their vision. To learn more, visit www.associaonline.com .
